banner.title: TP WorkLife 10/12
banner.mainContentHeadline: The podcast where science meets business
banner.mainContent: From fixing meetings to finding a mentor, get new insights to help you enjoy your time at work and thrive in your career.

videoData.title: Don't quit your job, use it for good
videoData.socialTitle: Don't quit your job, use it for good

nodes.whoTheyAre: In addition to her position as Global Customer Service Manager, Viviana Alvarez is a Unilever Global Foundation Ambassador and the President and co-founder of an NGO called Help to Haiti (H2H). In 2010, she was driven to help the people of Haiti after the devastating earthquake that struck. H2H remains focused on delivering basic needs, infrastructure, education, health and micro-financing to Haitian families.

videoData.description: When the 2010 earthquake hit Haiti, Viviana Alvarez was sitting at her desk in the UK. Immediately, she wanted to quit her job and help -- but she didn't. Instead, she leveraged her job to make the greatest difference she could make.
videoData.socialDescription: When the 2010 earthquake hit Haiti, Viviana Alvarez was sitting at her desk in the UK. Immediately, she wanted to quit her job and help -- but she didn't. Instead, she leveraged her job to make the greatest difference she could make.
